title: Remain
brief_description: In her 2018 2-channel video work Remain, Iranian born Melbourne artist Hoda Afshar works with several of the refugees who remain on Manus Island, encouraging the men to ‘re-enact their narratives with their own bodies and [gives] them autonomy to narrate their own stories’.

constellations_other.name: Seeking asylum
constellations_other.description: Chauka Please Tell Us the Time was covertly filmed on a smartphone inside the Manus Island Detention Centre and sent via WhatsApp.
